adaptive-sync-tooltip:
Enables or disables adaptive synchronization 
(often referred to as Variable Refresh Rate, 
or by the vendor-specific names FreeSync/G-Sync).
custom-mode-tooltip:
Adds '--custom' argument to set a mode 
not listed in the list of available modes.
Use this ONLY  if you know what you're doing.
dpms-tooltip:
Enables or disables output via DPMS. 
To turn an output off (ie. blank the screen 
but keep workspaces as-is), one can set DPMS to off.
modes-tooltip:
Displays a list of available 
output modes to choose from.
scale-filter-tooltip:
'Linear' is smoother and blurrier, 'nearest' is sharper and blockier.
Setting 'smart' will apply nearest when the output has an integer
scale factor, otherwise linear.
transform-tooltip: Sets the background transform to the given value.
